analyzed: idha bhikkhu rājā cakkavattī dhammikaḥ dhamma rājā dhammayā iva nissāya dhammaṃ sakkarontaḥ

analyzed: dhamma ketu dhamma ādhipateyyaḥ dhammikam rakkhā āvaraṇa guttim sa vidahitvā

analyzed: tat hoti cakkam appaṭivattiyam samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenacid vā lokasmin ti

original: ‘Yañca te idaṁ, samma rathakāra, cakkaṁ chahi māsehi niṭṭhitaṁ chārattūnehi yañca te idaṁ cakkaṁ chahi divasehi niṭṭhitaṁ, imesaṁ kiṁ nānākaraṇaṁ?
analyzed: yat ca te idam samma rathakāra cakkam chahi māsehi niṭṭhitam chārattūnehi yat ca te idam cakkam chahi divasehi niṭṭhitaḥ imesam kim nānākaraṇa

original: Nesāhaṁ kiñci nānākaraṇaṁ passāmī’ti.

analyzed: passatu devaḥ nānākaraṇanti

original: Yaṁ pana taṁ cakkaṁ chahi māsehi niṭṭhitaṁ chārattūnehi taṁ pavattesi.
analyzed: yam pana tam cakkam chahi māsehi niṭṭhitam chārattūnehi tam pavattesi

original: Taṁ pavattitaṁ samānaṁ yāvatikā abhisaṅkhārassa gati tāvatikaṁ gantvā akkhāhataṁ maññe aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: tam pavattitam samānam yāvatikā abhisaṅkhārassa gati tāvatikam gantvā akkhāhatam maññe aṭṭhāsi

original: ‘Ko nu kho, samma rathakāra, hetu ko paccayo yamidaṁ cakkaṁ chahi divasehi niṭṭhitaṁ
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho samma rathakāra hetu kaḥ paccayaḥ yam idam cakkam chahi divasehi

original: taṁ pavattitaṁ samānaṁ yāvatikā abhisaṅkhārassa gati tāvatikaṁ gantvā ciṅgulāyitvā bhūmiyaṁ papati?
analyzed: tam samānam yāvatikā abhisaṅkhārassa gati tāvatikam gantvā ciṅgulāyitvā bhūmiyam papati

original: Ko pana, samma rathakāra, hetu ko paccayo yamidaṁ cakkaṁ chahi māsehi niṭṭhitaṁ chārattūnehi
analyzed: kaḥ pana samma rathakāra hetu kaḥ paccayaḥ yam idam cakkam chahi māsehi niṭṭhitam chārattūnehi

original: ‘Yamidaṁ, deva, cakkaṁ chahi divasehi niṭṭhitaṁ tassa nemipi savaṅkā sadosā sakasāvā, arāpi savaṅkā sadosā sakasāvā, nābhipi savaṅkā sadosā sakasāvā.
analyzed: deva cakkam chahi divasehi niṭṭhitam tassa nemi pi sa vaṅkā sa dosā sa kasāvā arā pi sa vaṅkā sa dosā sa kasāvā nābhi pi sa vaṅkā sa dosā sa kasāvā

original: Yaṁ pana taṁ, deva, cakkaṁ chahi māsehi niṭṭhitaṁ chārattūnehi tassa nemipi avaṅkā adosā akasāvā, arāpi avaṅkā adosā akasāvā, nābhipi avaṅkā adosā akasāvā.

original: nābhiyāpi avaṅkattā adosattā akasāvattā pavattitaṁ samānaṁ yāvatikā abhisaṅkhārassa

analyzed: tāvatikam gantvā akkhāhatam maññe aṭṭhāsi iti

original: Siyā kho pana, bhikkhave, tumhākaṁ evamassa:

analyzed: tat āha bhikkhave kusalaḥ dāru vaṅkānam dāru dosānam dāru kasāvāna

analyzed: kāya kasāvaḥ vacī vaṅkaḥ appahīnaḥ vacī dosaḥ vacī kasāvaḥ manaḥ vaṅkaḥ appahīnaḥ manaḥ dosaḥ manaḥ kasāvaḥ

analyzed: evam papatitā te bhikkhave imasmai dhamma vinayā seyyathā api tam cakkam chahi divasehi

original: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā kāyavaṅko pahīno kāyadoso
analyzed: yassa kassaci bhikkhave bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā kāya vaṅkaḥ pahīnaḥ kāya doso

analyzed: kāya kasāvaḥ vacī vaṅkaḥ pahīnaḥ vacī dosaḥ vacī kasāvaḥ manaḥ vaṅkaḥ pahīnaḥ manaḥ dosaḥ manaḥ kasāvaḥ

original: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vidhuro hoti.
analyzed: evam kho bhikkhave bhikkhu vidhuraḥ hoti

original: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nissayasampanno hoti?
analyzed: kathañca bhikkhave bhikkhu nissaya sampannaḥ hoti

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā te kālena kālaṁ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati paripañhati:
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū bahu ssutāḥ āgata āgamāḥ dhamma dharāḥ vinaya dharāḥ mātikā dharā te kālena kālam upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati paripañhati

original: ‘idaṁ, bhante, kathaṁ, imassa ko attho’ti?

original: Tassa te āyasmanto avivaṭañceva vivaranti, anuttānīkatañca uttānīkaronti, anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṁ paṭivinodenti.
analyzed: tassa te āyasmantaḥ a vivaṭam ca iva vivaranti an uttānīkatam ca uttānīkaronti aneka vihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkham paṭivinodenti

original: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nissayasampanno hoti.
analyzed: evam kho bhikkhave bhikkhu nissaya sampannaḥ hoti

original: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu nacirasseva mahattaṁ vepullattaṁ pāpuṇāti kusalesu dhammesū”ti.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi dhammehi samannāgataḥ bhikkhu nacirassa iva mahattam vepulla ttam pāpuṇāti kusalesu dhammesu

original: Atha kho āyasmā ca samiddho āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sāriputtena saddhiṁ sammodiṁsu.

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ samiddhaṁ āyasmā sāriputto etadavoca:

original: So abyābajjhaṁ kāyasaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharitvā, abyābajjhaṁ vacīsaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharitvā, abyābajjhaṁ manosaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkharitvā abyābajjhaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā āḷaviyaṁ viharati gomagge siṁsapāvane paṇṇasanthare.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā āḷaviyam viharati gomagge sisapāvane paṇṇasanthare

original: Atha kho hatthako āḷavako jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno addasa bhagavantaṁ gomagge siṁsapāvane paṇṇasanthare nisinnaṁ.
analyzed: atha kho hatthakaḥ āḷavakaḥ jaṅghāvihāram anucaṅkamamānaḥ anuvicaramānaḥ addasa bhagavantam go magge sisapāvane paṇṇa santhare nisinna

original: Disvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho hatthako āḷavako bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: disvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho hatthakaḥ āḷavakaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “kacci, bhante bhagavā, sukhamasayitthā”ti?
analyzed: kacci bhante bhagavā sukham asayittha ati

original: “Evaṁ, kumāra, sukhamasayitthaṁ.
analyzed: eva kumāra sukham asayittha

original: Ye ca pana loke sukhaṁ senti, ahaṁ tesaṁ aññataro”ti.
analyzed: ye ca pana loke sukham senti aham tesam aññatarā ti

original: “Sītā, bhante, hemantikā ratti, antaraṭṭhako himapātasamayo, kharā gokaṇṭakahatā
analyzed: sītā bhante hemantikā ratti antaraṭṭhakaḥ himapāta samayaḥ kharā gokaṇṭaka hatā

analyzed: bhūmi tanukaḥ paṇṇasantharaḥ viraḷāni rukkhassa pattāni sītāni kāsāyāni vatthāni

original: sīto ca verambho vāto vāyati.
analyzed: ca verambhaḥ vātaḥ vāyati

original: ‘evaṁ, kumāra, sukhamasayitthaṁ.
analyzed: eva kumāra sukham asayittha

original: Ye ca pana loke sukhaṁ senti, ahaṁ tesaṁ aññataro’”ti.
analyzed: ye ca pana loke sukham senti aham tesam aññatarā ti

original: “Tena hi, kumāra, taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi. Yathā te khameyya tathā naṁ byākareyyāsi.
analyzed: tena hi kumāra tam na eva īttha paṭipucchissāmi yathā te khameyya tathā nam byākareyyāsi

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, kumāra, idhassa gahapatissa vā gahapatiputtassa vā kūṭāgāraṁ ullittāvalittaṁ nivātaṁ phusitaggaḷaṁ pihitavātapānaṁ.
analyzed: tam kim maññasi kumāra idhassa gahapatissa vā gahapati puttassa vā kūṭāgāram ullitta avalittam nivātam phusita ggaḷam pihita vāta pāna

original: Tatrassa pallaṅko gonakatthato paṭikatthato paṭalikatthato kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇo sauttaracchado ubhato lohitakūpadhāno;
analyzed: tatra assa pallaṅkaḥ gonakatthataḥ paṭikatthataḥ paṭalikatthataḥ kadali miga pavara paccattharaṇaḥ sa uttaracchadaḥ ubhatas lohita kūpa dhāno

original: telappadīpo cettha jhāyeyya;
analyzed: telappadīpo ca ittha jhāyeyya

original: catasso ca pajāpatiyo manāpāmanāpena paccupaṭṭhitā assu.
analyzed: catasso ca pajāpatiyaḥ manāpa amanāpena paccupaṭṭhitāḥ assu

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, kumāra, sukhaṁ vā so sayeyya no vā?

original: Kathaṁ vā te ettha hotī”ti?
analyzed: katham vā te ettha hoti iti

original: “Sukhaṁ so, bhante, sayeyya.
analyzed: sukham saḥ bhante sayeyya

original: Ye ca pana loke sukhaṁ senti, so tesaṁ aññataro”ti.
analyzed: ye ca pana loke sukham senti so tesam aññataro ti

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, kumāra,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi kumāra

original: api nu tassa gahapatissa vā gahapatiputtassa vā uppajjeyyuṁ rāgajā pariḷāhā kāyikā vā cetasikā vā yehi so rāgajehi pariḷāhehi pariḍayhamāno dukkhaṁ sayeyyā”ti?
analyzed: api nu tassa gahapatissa vā gahapati puttassa vā uppajjeyyum rāga jāḥ pariḷāhā kāyikāḥ vā cetasikāḥ vā yehi saḥ rāga jehi pariḷāhehi pariḍayhamānaḥ dukkham sayeyya ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti.
analyzed: eva bhanta iti

analyzed: āyatim an uppāda dhammaḥ

original: Tasmāhaṁ sukhamasayitthaṁ.
analyzed: tasmā aham

analyzed: tam kim maññasi kumāra

original: mohajā pariḷāhā kāyikā vā cetasikā vā yehi so mohajehi pariḷāhehi pariḍayhamāno dukkhaṁ sayeyyā”ti?
analyzed: moha jā pariḷāhā kāyikā vā cetasikā vā yehi saḥ moha jehi pariḷāhehi pariḍayhamānaḥ dukkham sayeyya ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti.
analyzed: eva bhanta iti

original: “Ye hi kho so, kumāra, gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā mohajehi pariḷāhehi pariḍayhamāno
analyzed: ye hi kho saḥ kumāra gahapati vā gahapati putto vā moha jehi pariḷāhehi pariḍayhamānaḥ

analyzed: dukkham sayeyya saḥ mohaḥ tathāgatassa pahīnaḥ ucchinna mūlaḥ tālā vatthukataḥ an abhāvaṅkataḥ

original: āyatiṁ anuppādadhammo.
analyzed: āyatim an uppāda dhammaḥ

original: Tasmāhaṁ sukhamasayitthanti.
analyzed: tasmā aham

analyzed: vineyya hadaye dara

original: Katamāni tīṇi?
analyzed: katamāni tīṇi

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kāyena duccaritaṁ carati, vācāya duccaritaṁ carati, manasā duccaritaṁ carati.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ kāyena duccaritam carati vācāya duccaritam carati manasā duccaritam carati

original: Tamenaṁ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā nānābāhāsu gahetvā yamassa rañño dassenti:

original: Imassa devo daṇḍaṁ paṇetū’ti.
analyzed: imassa devaḥ daṇḍam paṇetu iti

analyzed: ambho purisa na tvam addasa manussesu paṭhamam deva dūtam pātubhūtam ti

original: So evamāha:
analyzed: sā u evam āha

original: ‘nāddasaṁ, bhante’ti.

analyzed: ambho purisa na tvam addasa manussesu itthim vā purisam vā āsītikam vā nāvutika

original: tilakāhatagattan’ti?

original: So kho ahaṁ, bhikkhave, vassike pāsāde vassike cattāro māse nippurisehi tūriyehi paricārayamāno na heṭṭhāpāsādaṁ orohāmi.
analyzed: saḥ kho aha bhikkhave vassike pāsāde vassike cattāraḥ māse nippurisehi tūriyehi paricārayamānaḥ na heṭṭhā pāsādam orohāmi

original: Yathā kho pana, bhikkhave, aññesaṁ nivesane dāsakammakaraporisassa kaṇājakaṁ bhojanaṁ
analyzed: yathā kho pana bhikkhave aññesam nivesane dāsa kammakara porisassa kaṇājakam

original: dīyati bilaṅgadutiyaṁ, evamevassu me, bhikkhave, pitu nivesane dāsakammakaraporisassa
analyzed: dīyati bilaṅga dutiye me bhikkhave pitu nivesane dāsa kammakara porisassa

original: sālimaṁsodano dīyati.
analyzed: sālimasodanaḥ dīyati

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, evarūpāya iddhiyā samannāgatassa evarūpena ca sukhumālena etadahosi:
analyzed: tassa bhikkhave evarūpāya iddhiyā samannāgatassa evarūpena ca sukhu mālena etat ahosi

original: ‘assutavā kho puthujjano attanā jarādhammo samāno jaraṁ anatīto paraṁ jiṇṇaṁ disvā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati attānaṁyeva atisitvā, ahampi khomhi jarādhammo jaraṁ anatīto.
analyzed: assutavā kho puthujjanaḥ attanā jarā dhammo samānaḥ jaram an atītaḥ param jiṇṇam disvā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati attā anayā iva atisitvā aham pi kho mhi jarā dhammaḥ jaram an atītaḥ

original: Ahañceva kho pana jarādhammo samāno jaraṁ anatīto paraṁ jiṇṇaṁ disvā aṭṭīyeyyaṁ harāyeyyaṁ jiguccheyyaṁ na metaṁ assa patirūpan’ti.
analyzed: aham ca iva kho pana jarā dhammo samānaḥ jaram anatītaḥ param jiṇṇam disvā aṭṭīyeyyam harāyeyyam jiguccheyyam na mā etam assa patirūpanti

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhato yo yobbane yobbanamado so sabbaso pahīyi.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhataḥ yaḥ yobbane yobbana madaḥ so sabbasas pahīyi

original: Assutavā kho puthujjano attanā byādhidhammo samāno byādhiṁ anatīto paraṁ byādhitaṁ disvā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati attānaṁyeva atisitvā:
analyzed: a sutavā kho puthujjanaḥ attanā byādhi dhammo samānaḥ byādhim an atītaḥ param byādhitam disvā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati attā anayā iva atisitvā

original: ‘ahampi khomhi byādhidhammo byādhiṁ anatīto, ahañceva kho pana byādhidhammo samāno
analyzed: aham pi khomhi byādhi dhammaḥ byādhim anatītaḥ aham ca iva kho pana byādhi dhammaḥ samānaḥ

original: byādhiṁ anatīto paraṁ byādhikaṁ disvā aṭṭīyeyyaṁ harāyeyyaṁ jiguccheyyaṁ, na metaṁ assa patirūpan’ti.
analyzed: byādhim an atītaḥ param byādhikam disvā aṭṭīyeyyam harāyeyyam jiguccheyya na mā etam assa patirūpanti

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhato yo ārogye ārogyamado so sabbaso pahīyi.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhataḥ yaḥ ārogye ārogya madaḥ so sabbaso pahīyi

original: Assutavā kho puthujjano attanā maraṇadhammo samāno maraṇaṁ anatīto paraṁ mataṁ disvā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati attānaṁyeva atisitvā:
analyzed: assutavā kho puthujjanaḥ attanā maraṇa dhammo samānaḥ maraṇam anatītaḥ param matam disvā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati attā anayā iva atisitvā

original: ‘ahampi khomhi maraṇadhammo, maraṇaṁ anatīto, ahaṁ ceva kho pana maraṇadhammo samāno
analyzed: aham api khomhi maraṇa dhammaḥ maraṇam anatītaḥ aham ca iva kho pana maraṇa dhammaḥ samānaḥ

original: maraṇaṁ anatīto paraṁ mataṁ disvā aṭṭīyeyyaṁ harāyeyyaṁ jiguccheyyaṁ, na metaṁ assa patirūpan’ti.
analyzed: maraṇam an atītaḥ param matam disvā aṭṭīyeyyam harāyeyyam jiguccheyya na mā etam assa patirūpanti

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhato yo jīvite jīvitamado so sabbaso pahīyīti.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhave iti paṭisañcikkhataḥ yaḥ jīvite jīvita mado so sabbaso pahīyi iti

original: Tayome, bhikkhave, madā.
analyzed: tayo me bhikkhave madāḥ

original: Katame tayo?
analyzed: katame tayaḥ

original: Yobbanamado, ārogyamado, jīvitamado.
analyzed: ārogya madaḥ jīvita madaḥ

original: Yobbanamadamatto vā, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano kāyena duccaritaṁ carati, vācāya duccaritaṁ carati, manasā duccaritaṁ carati.
analyzed: yobbana mada mattaḥ vā bhikkhave assutavā puthujjanaḥ kāyena duccaritam carati vācāya duccaritam carati manasā duccaritam carati

original: So kāyena duccaritaṁ caritvā, vācāya duccaritaṁ caritvā, manasā duccaritaṁ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: saḥ kāyena duccaritam caritvā vācāya duccaritam caritvā manasā duccaritam caritvā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati

original: Ārogyamadamatto vā, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano …pe…
analyzed: ārogya mada mattaḥ vā bhikkhave assutavā puthujjanaḥ pe

original: jīvitamadamatto vā, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano kāyena duccaritaṁ carati, vācāya duccaritaṁ carati, manasā duccaritaṁ carati.
analyzed: jīvita mada mattaḥ vā bhikkhave assutavā puthujjanaḥ kāyena duccaritam carati vācāya duccaritam carati manasā duccaritam carati

original: So kāyena duccaritaṁ caritvā, vācāya duccaritaṁ caritvā, manasā duccaritaṁ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: saḥ kāyena duccaritam caritvā vācāya duccaritam caritvā manasā duccaritam caritvā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati

original: Yobbanamadamatto vā, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
analyzed: yobbana mada mattaḥ vā bhikkhave bhikkhu sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya āvattati

original: Ārogyamadamatto vā, bhikkhave, bhikkhu …pe…
analyzed: ārogya mada mattaḥ vā bhikkhave bhikkhu pe

original: jīvitamadamatto vā, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattatīti.
analyzed: jīvita mada mattaḥ vā bhikkhave bhikkhu sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya āvattati iti

original: Byādhidhammā jarādhammā,
analyzed: byādhi dhammā jarā dhammā

original: atho maraṇadhammino;
analyzed: atho maraṇa dhammino

original: Yathādhammā tathāsantā,
analyzed: yathā adhammā tathā asantā

original: jigucchanti puthujjanā.
analyzed: jigucchanti puthujjanā

original: Ahañce taṁ jiguccheyyaṁ,

original: evaṁdhammesu pāṇisu;

original: Na metaṁ patirūpassa,

analyzed: mama evam vihārinaḥ

original: ñatvā dhammaṁ nirūpadhiṁ;

original: Ārogye yobbanasmiñca,

original: jīvitasmiñca ye madā.

original: Sabbe made abhibhosmi,
analyzed: sabbe made abhibhosmi

original: Nekkhamme daṭṭhu khemataṁ;
analyzed: nekkhamme daṭṭhu khemata

original: Tassa me ahu ussāho,
analyzed: tassa me ahu ussāhaḥ

original: Nibbānaṁ abhipassato.
analyzed: nibbānam abhipassataḥ

original: Nāhaṁ bhabbo etarahi,
analyzed: na aham bhabbaḥ etarahi

original: Kāmāni paṭisevituṁ;
analyzed: kāmāni paṭisevitu

original: Anivatti bhavissāmi,
analyzed: anivatti bhavissāmi

original: Brahmacariyaparāyaṇo”ti.
analyzed: brahmacariya parāyaṇā iti

original: Navamaṁ.
analyzed: navama

original: Aṅguttara Nikāya 3.40
analyzed: aṅguttara nikāya

original: 4. Devadūtavagga
analyzed: deva dūta vagga

original: Ādhipateyyasutta
analyzed: ādhipateyya sutta

original: “Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, ādhipateyyāni.
analyzed: tīṇi imāni bhikkhave ādhipateyyāni

original: Katamāni tīṇi?
analyzed: katamāni tīṇi

original: Attādhipateyyaṁ, lokādhipateyyaṁ, dhammādhipateyyaṁ.
analyzed: attā ādhipateyya loka ādhipateyya dhamma ādhipateyya

original: Katamañca, bhikkhave, attādhipateyyaṁ?
analyzed: katamat ca bhikkhave attā ādhipateyya

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu arañña gataḥ vā rukkha mūla gataḥ vā suññāgāra gataḥ vā iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘na kho panāhaṁ cīvarahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
analyzed: na kho pana aham cīvara hetu agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ

original: Na piṇḍapātahetu, na senāsanahetu, na itibhavābhavahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
analyzed: na piṇḍapāta hetu na senāsana hetu na iti bhava abhava hetu agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ

original: Api ca khomhi otiṇṇo jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto.
analyzed: api ca khomhi otiṇṇaḥ jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkha utiṇṇaḥ dukkha paretaḥ

original: Appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethāti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anta kiriyā paññāyetha ati

original: Ahañceva kho pana yādisake kāme ohāya agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito tādisake vā kāme pariyeseyyaṁ tato vā pāpiṭṭhatare, na metaṁ patirūpan’ti.
analyzed: aham ca iva kho pana yādisake kāme ohāya agārasmaā anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ tādisake vā kāme pariyeseyyam tatas vā pāpiṭṭhatare na mā etam patirūpanti

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘āraddhaṁ kho pana me vīriyaṁ bhavissati asallīnaṁ, upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṁ cittaṁ ekaggan’ti.
analyzed: āraddham kho pana me vīriyam bhavissati a sallīna upaṭṭhitā sati a sammuṭṭhā passaddhaḥ kāyaḥ a sāraddhaḥ samāhitam cittam ekaggan ti

original: So attānaṁyeva adhipatiṁ karitvā akusalaṁ pajahati, kusalaṁ bhāveti, sāvajjaṁ pajahati, anavajjaṁ bhāveti, suddhaṁ attānaṁ pariharati.
analyzed: saḥ attā anayā iva adhipatim karitvā akusalam pajahati kusalam bhāveti sāvajjam pajahati anavajjam bhāveti suddham attānam pariharati

original: Idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, attādhipateyyaṁ.
analyzed: idam vuccati bhikkhave attādhipateyya

original: Katamañca, bhikkhave, lokādhipateyyaṁ?
analyzed: katamat ca bhikkhave loka ādhipateyya

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu arañña gataḥ vā rukkha mūla gataḥ vā suññāgāra gataḥ vā iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘na kho panāhaṁ cīvarahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
analyzed: na kho pana aham cīvara hetu agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ

original: Na piṇḍapātahetu, na senāsanahetu, na itibhavābhavahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
analyzed: na piṇḍapāta hetu na senāsana hetu na iti bhava abhava hetu agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ

original: Api ca khomhi otiṇṇo jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto.
analyzed: api ca khomhi otiṇṇaḥ jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkha utiṇṇaḥ dukkha paretaḥ

original: Appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anta kiriyā paññāyetha ati

original: Ahañceva kho pana evaṁ pabbajito samāno kāmavitakkaṁ vā vitakkeyyaṁ, byāpādavitakkaṁ vā vitakkeyyaṁ, vihiṁsāvitakkaṁ vā vitakkeyyaṁ, mahā kho panāyaṁ lokasannivāso.
analyzed: aham ca iva kho pana evam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ kāma vitakkam vā vitakkeyya byāpāda vitakkam vā vitakkeyya vihisā vitakkam vā vitakkeyya mahā kho pana ayam loka sannivāsaḥ

original: Mahantasmiṁ kho pana lokasannivāse santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā iddhimanto dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduno.
analyzed: mahantasmin kho pana loka sannivāse santi samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ iddhimantaḥ dibba cakkhukā para citta vidunaḥ

original: Te dūratopi passanti, āsannāpi na dissanti, cetasāpi cittaṁ pajānanti.
analyzed: te dūratas pi passanti āsannā api na dissanti cetasā api cittam pajānanti

original: Tepi maṁ evaṁ jāneyyuṁ:
analyzed: te api mam evam jāneyyu

original: ‘passatha, bho, imaṁ kulaputtaṁ saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti.
analyzed: passatha bho imam kula puttam saddhāḥ agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ vokiṇṇaḥ viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi iti

original: devatāpi kho santi iddhimantiniyo dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduniyo.
analyzed: devatā api kho santi iddhimantiniyaḥ dibba cakkhukā para citta viduniyaḥ

original: Tā dūratopi passanti, āsannāpi na dissanti, cetasāpi cittaṁ jānanti.
analyzed: tāḥ dūratas pi passanti āsannāḥ api na dissanti cetasā api cittam jānanti

original: Tāpi maṁ evaṁ jāneyyuṁ:
analyzed: tāḥ api mam evam jāneyyu

original: ‘passatha, bho, imaṁ kulaputtaṁ saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti.
analyzed: passatha bho imam kula puttam saddhāḥ agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ vokiṇṇaḥ viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi iti

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: So lokaṁyeva adhipatiṁ karitvā akusalaṁ pajahati, kusalaṁ bhāveti, sāvajjaṁ pajahati, anavajjaṁ bhāveti, suddhaṁ attānaṁ pariharati.
analyzed: saḥ lokayā iva adhipatim karitvā akusalam pajahati kusalam bhāveti sāvajjam pajahati anavajjam bhāveti suddham attānam pariharati

original: Idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, lokādhipateyyaṁ.
analyzed: idam vuccati bhikkhave loka ādhipateyya

original: Katamañca, bhikkhave, dhammādhipateyyaṁ?
analyzed: katamat ca bhikkhave dhamma ādhipateyya

original: ‘na kho panāhaṁ cīvarahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
analyzed: na kho pana aham cīvara hetu agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ

original: Na piṇḍapātahetu, na senāsanahetu, na itibhavābhavahetu agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito.
analyzed: na piṇḍapāta hetu na senāsana hetu na iti bhava abhava hetu agārasma anagāriyam pabbajitaḥ

original: Api ca khomhi otiṇṇo jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto.
analyzed: api ca khomhi otiṇṇaḥ jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkha utiṇṇaḥ dukkha paretaḥ

original: Appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethāti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa anta kiriyā paññāyetha ati

original: Svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhīti.
analyzed: su ākkhātaḥ bhagavatā dhammaḥ sandiṭṭhikaḥ akālikaḥ ehipassikaḥ opaneyyikaḥ paccattam veditabbaḥ viññūhi iti

original: Santi kho pana me sabrahmacārī jānaṁ passaṁ viharanti.
analyzed: santi kho pana me sabrahmacārī jānam passam viharanti

original: Ahañceva kho pana evaṁ svākkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajito samāno kusīto vihareyyaṁ pamatto, na metaṁ assa patirūpan’ti.
analyzed: aham ca iva kho pana evam su ākkhāte dhamma vinaye pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ kusītaḥ vihareyyam pamattaḥ na mā etam assa patirūpanti

original: So iti paṭisañcikkhati:

analyzed: āraddham kho pana me vīriyam bhavissati a sallīna upaṭṭhitā sati a sammuṭṭhā passaddhaḥ kāyaḥ a sāraddhaḥ samāhitam cittam ekaggan ti

analyzed: saḥ dhammayā iva adhipatim karitvā akusalam pajahati kusalam bhāveti sāvajjam pajahati anavajjam bhāveti suddham attānam pariharati

original: Idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammādhipateyyaṁ.
analyzed: idam vuccati bhikkhave dhamma ādhipateyya

original: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi ādhipateyyānīti.
analyzed: imāni kho bhikkhave tīṇi ādhipateyyāni iti

original: pāpakammaṁ pakubbato;

original: saccaṁ vā yadi vā musā.

original: Yo santaṁ attani pāpaṁ,

original: attānaṁ parigūhasi.

analyzed: iti ayam ca iva satthā dhammam deseti pare ca tathatthāya paṭipajjanti tāni kho pana honti anekāni api satāni anekāni ipi sahassāni anekāni api sata sahassāni

original: ‘imāsaṁ te, brāhmaṇa, dvinnaṁ paṭipadānaṁ katamā paṭipadā khamati appatthatarā ca appasamārambhatarā ca mahapphalatarā ca mahānisaṁsatarā cā’”ti?
analyzed: imāsam te brāhmaṇa dvinnam paṭipadānam katamā paṭipadā khamati appatthatarā ca appa samārambhatarā ca mahapphalatarā ca mahā nisasatarā ca ati

original: Tatiyampi kho saṅgāravo brāhmaṇo āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho saṅgāravaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “seyyathāpi bhavaṁ gotamo bhavaṁ cānando.
analyzed: sā iyyathā api bhavam gotamaḥ bhavam ca ānandaḥ

original: Ete me pujjā, ete me pāsaṁsā”ti.
analyzed: ete me pujjāḥ ete me

original: “kā nvajja, brāhmaṇa, rājantepure rājapurisānaṁ sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ antarākathā udapādī”ti?

original: “Ayaṁ khvajja, bho gotama, rājantepure rājapurisānaṁ sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ antarākathā udapādi:

original: ‘pubbe sudaṁ appatarā ceva bhikkhū ahesuṁ bahutarā ca uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ dassesuṁ;
analyzed: pubbe sudam appatarā ca iva bhikkhū ahesum bahutarā ca uttari manussa dhammā iddhi pāṭihāriyam dassesu

original: etarahi pana bahutarā ceva bhikkhū appatarā ca uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ dassentī’ti.
analyzed: etarahi pana bahutarā ca iva bhikkhū appatarā ca uttari manussa dhammā iddhipāṭihāriyam dassenti iti

original: Ayaṁ khvajja, bho gotama, rājantepure rājapurisānaṁ sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ antarākathā udapādī”ti.
analyzed: ayam khvajja bho gotama rājantepure rāja purisānam sannisinnānam sannipatitānam antarākathā udapādi iti

original: “Tīṇi kho imāni, brāhmaṇa, pāṭihāriyāni.

original: Katamañca, brāhmaṇa, iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ?

analyzed: idha brāhmaṇaḥ ekaccaḥ aneka vihitam iddhi vidham paccanubhoti ekaḥ api hutvā bahudhā

analyzed: a sajjamānaḥ gacchati sā iyathā api ākāse pathaviyā api ummujja nimujjam karoti sā iyathā api

original: udake; udakepi abhijjamāne gacchati, seyyathāpi pathaviyaṁ; ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamati,
analyzed: udake udake pi abhijjamāne gacchati seyyathā api pathaviye ākāse pi pallaṅkena kamati

original: seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo; imepi candimasūriye evaṁmahiddhike evaṁmahānubhāve pāṇinā
analyzed: seyyathā api pakkhī sakuṇaḥ ime api candima sūriye eva mahiddhike eva mahā anubhāve pāṇinā

original: parimasati parimajjati, yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vatteti’.

original: Idaṁ vuccati, brāhmaṇa, iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ.
analyzed: idam vuccati brāhmaṇaḥ iddhi pāṭihāriya

original: Katamañca, brāhmaṇa, ādesanāpāṭihāriyaṁ?

original: Idha pana, brāhmaṇa, ekacco na heva kho nimittena ādisati, api ca kho manussānaṁ vā amanussānaṁ vā devatānaṁ vā saddaṁ sutvā ādisati:

original: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
analyzed: evam pi te manaḥ ittham pi te manaḥ iti pi te cittanti

original: So bahuñcepi ādisati tatheva taṁ hoti, no aññathā.

original: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti.
analyzed: evam pi te manaḥ ittham pi te manaḥ iti pi te cittanti

original: So bahuñcepi ādisati tatheva taṁ hoti, no aññathā.
analyzed: saḥ bahuñca ipi ādisati tathā iva tam hoti no aññathā

original: Idha pana, brāhmaṇa, ekacco na heva kho nimittena ādisati, napi manussānaṁ vā amanussānaṁ
analyzed: idha pana brāhmaṇaḥ ekaccaḥ na ha iva kho nimittena ādisati na pi manussānam vā amanussāna

original: vā devatānaṁ vā saddaṁ sutvā ādisati, napi vitakkayato vicārayato vitakkavipphārasaddaṁ
analyzed: vā devatānam vā saddam sutvā ādisati vitakkayataḥ vicārayataḥ vitakka vipphāra sadda

original: Katamañca, brāhmaṇa, anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṁ?

analyzed: tatra bho gotama yat idam pāṭihāriyam idha ekaccaḥ aneka vihitam iddhividham paccanubhoti pe

original: yāva brāhmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vatteti,
analyzed: yāva brāhma lokā api kāyena vasam vatta iti

analyzed: idam me bho gotama pāṭihāriyam māyā sahadhamma rūpam viya khāyati

original: Yampidaṁ, bho gotama, pāṭihāriyaṁ idhekacco nimittena ādisati:

original: ‘evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te cittan’ti, so bahuñcepi ādisati tatheva taṁ hoti, no aññathā.
analyzed: evam pi te manaḥ ittham pi te manaḥ iti pi te cittanti saḥ bahuñca ipi ādisati tathā iva tam hoti no aññathā

original: Idha pana, bho gotama, ekacco na heva kho nimittena ādisati, api ca kho manussānaṁ vā amanussānaṁ vā devatānaṁ vā saddaṁ sutvā ādisati …pe…
analyzed: idha pana bho gotama ekaccaḥ na ha iva kho nimittena ādisati api ca kho manussānam vā amanussānam vā devatānam vā saddam sutvā ādisati pe

original: napi manussānaṁ vā amanussānaṁ vā devatānaṁ vā saddaṁ sutvā ādisati, api ca kho vitakkayato vicārayato vitakkavipphārasaddaṁ sutvā ādisati …pe…
analyzed: na api manussānam vā amanussānam vā devatānam vā saddam sutvā ādisati api ca kho vitakkayataḥ vicārayataḥ vitakka vipphāra saddam sutvā ādisati pe

original: napi vitakkayato vicārayato vitakkavipphārasaddaṁ sutvā ādisati, api ca kho avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhiṁ samāpannassa cetasā ceto paricca pajānāti:

original: ‘yathā imassa bhoto manosaṅkhārā paṇihitā imassa cittassa anantarā amhaṁ nāma vitakkaṁ vitakkessatī’ti, so bahuñcepi ādisati tatheva taṁ hoti, no aññathā.

original: Idampi, bho gotama, pāṭihāriyaṁ yova naṁ karoti sova naṁ paṭisaṁvedeti, yova naṁ karoti tasseva taṁ hoti.
analyzed: idam pi bho gotama pāṭihāriyam yaḥ uva nam karoti saḥ uva nam paṭisavedeti yaḥ uva nam karoti tassa iva tam hoti

original: Idampi me, bho gotama, pāṭihāriyaṁ māyāsahadhammarūpaṁ viya khāyati.
analyzed: idam pi me bho gotama pāṭihāriyam māyā sahadhamma rūpam viya khāyati

original: Yañca kho idaṁ, bho gotama, pāṭihāriyaṁ idhekacco evaṁ anusāsati:

original: ‘evaṁ vitakketha, mā evaṁ vitakkayittha; evaṁ manasi karotha, mā evaṁ manasākattha; idaṁ pajahatha, idaṁ upasampajja viharathā’ti.
analyzed: evam vitakketha mā evam vitakkayittha evam manasi karotha mā evam manasā akattha idam pajahatha idam upasampajja viharatha ati

original: Idameva, bho gotama, pāṭihāriyaṁ khamati imesaṁ tiṇṇaṁ pāṭihāriyānaṁ abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
analyzed: idam eva bho gotama pāṭihāriyam khamati imesam tiṇṇam pāṭihāriyānam abhikkantataram ca paṇītataram ca

original: Acchariyaṁ, bho gotama, abbhutaṁ, bho gotama.
analyzed: acchariya bho gotama abbhuta bho gotama

original: Yāvasubhāsitamidaṁ bhotā gotamena imehi ca mayaṁ tīhi pāṭihāriyehi samannāgataṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ dhārema.
analyzed: yāvasu bhāsitam idam bhotā gotamena imehi ca mayam tīhi pāṭihāriyehi samannāgatam bhavantam gotamam dhārema

original: Bhavañhi gotamo anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhoti …pe… yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vatteti,
analyzed: bhavan hi gotamaḥ aneka vihitam iddhi vidham paccanubhoti pe yāva brahma lokā api kāyena vasam vatta iti

original: bhavañhi gotamo avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhiṁ samāpannassa cetasā ceto paricca pajānāti:
analyzed: bhavan hi gotamaḥ a vitakkam a vicāram samādhim samāpannassa cetasā cetaḥ paricca pajānāti

original: ‘yathā imassa bhoto manosaṅkhārā paṇihitā imassa cittassa anantarā amuṁ nāma vitakkaṁ vitakkessatī’ti.
analyzed: yathā imassa bhoto manaḥ saṅkhārā paṇihitāḥ imassa cittassa anantarā amum nāma vitakkam vitakkessati iti

original: Bhavañhi gotamo evamanusāsati:
analyzed: bhavan hi gotamaḥ evam anusāsati

original: ‘evaṁ vitakketha, mā evaṁ vitakkayittha; evaṁ manasi karotha, mā evaṁ manasākattha; idaṁ pajahatha, idaṁ upasampajja viharathā’”ti.
analyzed: evam vitakketha mā evam vitakkayittha evam manasi karotha mā evam manasā akattha idam pajahatha idam upasampajja viharatha ati

original: “Addhā kho tyāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, āsajja upanīya vācā bhāsitā;
analyzed: addhā kho tyā āha brāhmaṇaḥ āsajjaḥ upanīya vācā bhāsitā

original: api ca tyāhaṁ byākarissāmi.
analyzed: api ca tyā aham byākarissāmi

original: Ahañhi, brāhmaṇa, anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhomi …pe… yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vattemi.
analyzed: aham hi brāhmaṇa aneka vihitam iddhi vidham paccanubhomi pe yāva kāyena vasam vattemi

original: Ahañhi, brāhmaṇa, avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhiṁ samāpannassa cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
analyzed: aham hi brāhmaṇa a vitakkam a vicāram samādhim samāpannassa cetasā cetaḥ paricca pajānāmi

original: ‘yathā imassa bhoto manosaṅkhārā paṇihitā, imassa cittassa anantarā amuṁ nāma vitakkaṁ vitakkessatī’ti.
analyzed: yathā imassa bhoto manaḥ saṅkhārā paṇihitāḥ imassa cittassa anantarā amum nāma vitakkam vitakkessati iti

original: Ahañhi, brāhmaṇa, evamanusāsāmi:
analyzed: aham hi brāhmaṇaḥ evam anusāsāmi

original: ‘evaṁ vitakketha, mā evaṁ vitakkayittha; evaṁ manasi karotha, mā evaṁ manasākattha; idaṁ pajahatha, idaṁ upasampajja viharathā’”ti.
analyzed: evam vitakketha mā evam vitakkayittha evam manasi karotha mā evam manasā akattha idam pajahatha idam upasampajja viharatha ati

original: “Atthi pana, bho gotama, añño ekabhikkhupi yo imehi tīhi pāṭihāriyehi samannāgato, aññatra bhotā gotamenā”ti?
analyzed: atthi pana bho gotama aññaḥ yaḥ imehi tīhi pāṭihāriyehi samannāgataḥ aññatra bhotā gotamena ati

original: “Na kho, brāhmaṇa, ekaṁyeva sataṁ na dve satāni na tīṇi satāni na cattāri satāni na pañca satāni, atha kho bhiyyova, ye bhikkhū imehi tīhi pāṭihāriyehi samannāgatā”ti.
analyzed: na kho brāhmaṇaḥ ekayā iva satam na dve satāni na tīṇi satāni na cattāri satāni na pañca satāni atha kho bhiyyas uva ye bhikkhū imehi tīhi pāṭihāriyehi samannāgatā ati

original: “Kahaṁ pana, bho gotama, etarahi te bhikkhū viharantī”ti?
analyzed: kaham pana bho gotama etarahi te bhikkhū viharanti iti

original: “Imasmiṁyeva kho, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhusaṅghe”ti.
analyzed: imasmiya eva kho brāhmaṇa bhikkhu saṅghe ti

original: “Abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama.
analyzed: abhikkanta bho gotama abhikkanta bho gotama

original: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa
analyzed: seyyathā api bho gotama nikkujjitam vā ukkujjeyya paṭicchannam vā vivareyya mūḷhassa

original: vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya: ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti;
analyzed: vā maggam ācikkheyya andhakāre vā tela pajjotam dhāreyya cakkhumantaḥ rūpāni dakkhanti iti

original: evamevaṁ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
analyzed: evam evam bhotā gotamena aneka pariyāyena dhammo pakāsito

original: Esāhaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi, dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.

analyzed: upāsakam mam bhavam gotamaḥ dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetam saraṇam gatanti

original: Titthāyatanasutta
analyzed: titthāyatana sutta

original: “Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, titthāyatanāni yāni paṇḍitehi samanuyuñjiyamānāni samanugāhiyamānāni samanubhāsiyamānāni parampi gantvā akiriyāya saṇṭhahanti.

original: Katamāni tīṇi?
analyzed: katamāni tīṇi

original: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṁvādino evaṁdiṭṭhino:
analyzed: santi bhikkhave eke samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ eva vādinaḥ eva diṭṭhinaḥ

original: ‘yaṁ kiñcāyaṁ purisapuggalo paṭisaṁvedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā sabbaṁ taṁ pubbekatahetū’ti.
analyzed: yam kiñca ayam purisa puggalaḥ paṭisavedeti sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukham vā sabbam tam pubbekata hetu uti

original: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṁvādino evaṁdiṭṭhino:
analyzed: santi bhikkhave eke samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ eva vādinaḥ eva diṭṭhinaḥ

original: ‘yaṁ kiñcāyaṁ purisapuggalo paṭisaṁvedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā sabbaṁ taṁ issaranimmānahetū’ti.
analyzed: yam kiñca ayam purisa puggalaḥ paṭisavedeti sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukham vā sabbam tam issara nimmāna hetu uti

original: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṁvādino evaṁdiṭṭhino:
analyzed: santi bhikkhave eke samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ eva vādinaḥ eva diṭṭhinaḥ

original: ‘yaṁ kiñcāyaṁ purisapuggalo paṭisaṁvedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā sabbaṁ taṁ ahetuappaccayā’ti.
analyzed: yam kiñca ayam purisa puggalaḥ paṭisavedeti sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukham vā sabbam tam ahetu appaccayā ati

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṁvādino evaṁdiṭṭhino:
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave ye te samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ eva vādinaḥ eva diṭṭhinaḥ

original: ‘yaṁ kiñcāyaṁ purisapuggalo paṭisaṁvedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā sabbaṁ taṁ pubbekatahetū’ti, tyāhaṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadāmi:
analyzed: yam kiñca ayam purisa puggalaḥ paṭisavedeti sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukham vā sabbam tam pubbekata hetu iti tyā aham upasaṅkamitvā evam vadāmi

original: ‘saccaṁ kira tumhe āyasmanto evaṁvādino evaṁdiṭṭhino:
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe āyasmantaḥ eva vādinaḥ eva diṭṭhinaḥ

original: “yaṁ kiñcāyaṁ purisapuggalo paṭisaṁvedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā sabbaṁ taṁ pubbekatahetū”’ti?
analyzed: yam kiñca ayam purisa puggalaḥ paṭisavedeti sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukham vā sabbam tam pubbekata hetu uti

original: Te ca me evaṁ puṭṭhā ‘āmā’ti paṭijānanti.

original: pubbekatahetu, abrahmacārino bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, musāvādino bhavissanti pubbekatahetu,

analyzed: bhavissanti pubbekata hetu abhijjhālunaḥ bhavissanti pubbekata hetu byāpanna cittāḥ

original: bhavissanti pubbekatahetu, micchādiṭṭhikā bhavissanti pubbekatahetu’.
analyzed: bhavissanti pubbekata hetu micchādiṭṭhikāḥ bhavissanti pubbekata hetu

original: Pubbekataṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, sārato paccāgacchataṁ na hoti chando vā vāyāmo vā idaṁ vā karaṇīyaṁ idaṁ vā akaraṇīyanti.
analyzed: pubbekatam kho pana bhikkhave sārataḥ paccāgacchatam na hoti chandaḥ vā vāyāmaḥ vā idam vā karaṇīyam idam vā a karaṇīyanti

original: Iti karaṇīyākaraṇīye kho pana saccato thetato anupalabbhiyamāne muṭṭhassatīnaṁ anārakkhānaṁ viharataṁ na hoti paccattaṁ sahadhammiko samaṇavādo.
analyzed: iti karaṇīya akaraṇīye kho pana saccataḥ thetataḥ an upalabbhiyamāne muṭṭhassatīnam anārakkhānam viharatam na hoti paccattam sahadhammikaḥ samaṇa vādaḥ

original: Ayaṁ kho me, bhikkhave, tesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu evaṁvādīsu evaṁdiṭṭhīsu paṭhamo sahadhammiko niggaho hoti.

original: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṁvādino evaṁdiṭṭhino:
analyzed: tatra bhikkhave ye te samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ eva vādinaḥ eva diṭṭhinaḥ

original: Ahetuappaccayaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, sārato paccāgacchataṁ na hoti chando vā vāyāmo vā idaṁ vā karaṇīyaṁ idaṁ vā akaraṇīyanti.

original: Iti karaṇīyākaraṇīye kho pana saccato thetato anupalabbhiyamāne muṭṭhassatīnaṁ anārakkhānaṁ viharataṁ na hoti paccattaṁ sahadhammiko samaṇavādo.

original: Ayaṁ kho me, bhikkhave, tesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu evaṁvādīsu evaṁdiṭṭhīsu tatiyo sahadhammiko niggaho hoti.

original: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi titthāyatanāni yāni paṇḍitehi samanuyuñjiyamānāni samanugāhiyamānāni samanubhāsiyamānāni parampi gantvā akiriyāya saṇṭhahanti.
analyzed: imāni kho bhikkhave tīṇi titthāyatanāni yāni paṇḍitehi samanuyuñjiyamānāni samanugāhiyamānāni samanubhāsiyamānāni param pi gantvā a kiriyāya saṇṭhahanti

original: Ayaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo desito aniggahito asaṅkiliṭṭho anupavajjo appaṭikuṭṭho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
analyzed: ayam kho pana bhikkhave mayā dhammaḥ desitaḥ a niggahitaḥ a saṅkiliṭṭhaḥ an upavajjaḥ a paṭikuṭṭhaḥ samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi

original: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo desito aniggahito asaṅkiliṭṭho anupavajjo appaṭikuṭṭho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi?
analyzed: katamaḥ ca bhikkhave mayā dhammaḥ desitaḥ a niggahitaḥ a saṅkiliṭṭhaḥ an upavajjaḥ a paṭikuṭṭhaḥ samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi

original: Imā cha dhātuyoti, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo desito aniggahito asaṅkiliṭṭho anupavajjo appaṭikuṭṭho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
analyzed: imāḥ cha dhātuyaḥ ti bhikkhave mayā dhammaḥ desitaḥ a niggahitaḥ a saṅkiliṭṭhaḥ an upavajjaḥ a paṭikuṭṭhaḥ samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi

original: Imāni cha phassāyatanānīti, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo desito aniggahito asaṅkiliṭṭho anupavajjo appaṭikuṭṭho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
analyzed: imāni cha phassa āyatanāni iti bhikkhave mayā dhammaḥ desitaḥ a niggahitaḥ a saṅkiliṭṭhaḥ an upavajjaḥ a paṭikuṭṭhaḥ samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi

original: Ime aṭṭhārasa manopavicārāti, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo desito aniggahito asaṅkiliṭṭho anupavajjo appaṭikuṭṭho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
analyzed: ime aṭṭhārasa manopavicārā ti bhikkhave mayā dhammaḥ desitaḥ a niggahitaḥ a saṅkiliṭṭhaḥ an upavajjaḥ a paṭikuṭṭhaḥ samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi

original: Imāni cattāri ariyasaccānīti, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo desito aniggahito asaṅkiliṭṭho anupavajjo appaṭikuṭṭho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi.
analyzed: imāni cattāri ariya saccāni iti bhikkhave mayā dhammaḥ desitaḥ a niggahitaḥ a saṅkiliṭṭhaḥ an upavajjaḥ a paṭikuṭṭhaḥ samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi

original: Imā cha dhātuyoti, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo desito aniggahito asaṅkiliṭṭho anupavajjo appaṭikuṭṭho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhīti.
analyzed: imāḥ cha dhātuyaḥ ti bhikkhave mayā dhammaḥ desitaḥ a niggahitaḥ a saṅkiliṭṭhaḥ an upavajjaḥ a paṭikuṭṭhaḥ samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi iti

original: Iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ.
analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta

original: Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
analyzed: kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

original: Chayimā, bhikkhave, dhātuyo—
analyzed: chayimāḥ bhikkhave dhātuyaḥ

original: pathavīdhātu, āpodhātu, tejodhātu, vāyodhātu, ākāsadhātu, viññāṇadhātu.
analyzed: pathavī dhātu āpaḥ dhātu tejaḥ dhātu vāyo dhātu ākāsa dhātu viññāṇa dhātu

original: Imā cha dhātuyoti, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo desito aniggahito asaṅkiliṭṭho anupavajjo appaṭikuṭṭho samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhīti.
analyzed: imāḥ cha dhātuyaḥ ti bhikkhave mayā dhammaḥ desitaḥ a niggahitaḥ a saṅkiliṭṭhaḥ an upavajjaḥ a paṭikuṭṭhaḥ samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhi iti

original: Atthi, bhikkhave, maggo atthi paṭipadā imesañca tiṇṇaṁ samātāputtikānaṁ bhayānaṁ imesañca tiṇṇaṁ amātāputtikānaṁ bhayānaṁ pahānāya samatikkamāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave maggaḥ atthi paṭipadā imesaṃ ca tiṇṇam sa mātāputtikānam bhayānam imesaṃ ca tiṇṇam a mātāputtikānam bhayānam pahānāya samatikkamāya savattati

original: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, maggo katamā ca paṭipadā imesañca tiṇṇaṁ samātāputtikānaṁ bhayānaṁ imesañca tiṇṇaṁ amātāputtikānaṁ bhayānaṁ pahānāya samatikkamāya saṁvattati?
analyzed: katamaḥ ca bhikkhave maggaḥ katamā ca paṭipadā imesaṃ ca tiṇṇam sa mātāputtikānam bhayānam imesaṃ ca tiṇṇam a mātāputtikānam bhayānam pahānāya samatikkamāya savattati

original: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: ayam eva ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo

original: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
analyzed: sammā diṭṭhi sammā saṅkappo sammā vācā sammā kammanto sammā ājīvaḥ sammā vāyāmaḥ sammā sati sammā samādhi

original: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhave, maggo ayaṁ paṭipadā imesañca tiṇṇaṁ samātāputtikānaṁ bhayānaṁ imesañca tiṇṇaṁ amātāputtikānaṁ bhayānaṁ pahānāya samatikkamāya saṁvattatī”ti.
analyzed: ayam kho bhikkhave maggaḥ ayam paṭipadā imesaṃ ca tiṇṇam sa mātāputtikānam bhayānam imesaṃ ca tiṇṇam a mātāputtikānam bhayānam pahānāya samatikkamāya savattati iti

original: Dutiyaṁ.
analyzed: dutiya

original: Aṅguttara Nikāya 3.63
analyzed: aṅguttara nikāya

original: 7. Mahāvagga
analyzed: mahāvagga

original: Venāgapurasutta
analyzed: venāgapura sutta

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ yena venāgapuraṁ nāma kosalānaṁ brāhmaṇagāmo tadavasari.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā kosalesu cārikam caramānaḥ mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim yena venāgapuram nāma kosalānam brāhmaṇa gāmaḥ tat avasari

original: Assosuṁ kho venāgapurikā brāhmaṇagahapatikā:
analyzed: venāgapurikā brāhmaṇa gahapatikā

original: “samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito venāgapuraṁ anuppatto.
analyzed: samaṇaḥ khalu bho gotamaḥ sakya putto sakya kulā pabbajitaḥ venāgapuram anuppatto

original: Taṁ kho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
analyzed: tam kha pana bhavantam gotamam evam kalyāṇaḥ kitti saddaḥ abbhuggataḥ

original: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
analyzed: iti pi saḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ vijjā caraṇa sampanno sugataḥ loka vidū anuttaraḥ purisa damma sārathi satthā deva manussānam buddhaḥ bhagavā ati

original: So imaṁ lokaṁ sadevakaṁ samārakaṁ sabrahmakaṁ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṁ pajaṁ sadevamanussaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti.
analyzed: saḥ imam lokam sa devakam sa mārakam sa brahmakam sa ssamaṇa brāhmaṇim pajam sa deva manussam sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti

original: So dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pakāseti.
analyzed: saḥ dhammam deseti ādi kalyāṇam majjhe kalyāṇam pariyosāna kalyāṇam sa attham sa byañjana kevala paripuṇṇam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakāseti

original: Sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṁ arahataṁ dassanaṁ hotī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu kho pana tathārūpānam arahatam dassanam hoti iti

original: Atha kho venāgapurikā brāhmaṇagahapatikā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: atha khalu venāgapurikāḥ brāhmaṇa gahapatikāḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamiṣu upasaṅkamitvā

original: appekacce bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu, appekacce bhagavatā saddhiṁ
analyzed: appekacce bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu appekacce bhagavatā saddhi

original: sammodiṁsu, sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu, appekacce
analyzed: sammodisu sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdisu appekacce

original: yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu, appekacce nāmagottaṁ sāvetvā
analyzed: yena bhagavā tena añjalim paṇāmetvā ekamantam appekacce nāma gottam sāvetvā

original: ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu, appekacce tuṇhībhūtā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinno
analyzed: ekamantam nisīdisu appekacce tuṇhībhūtāḥ ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinno

original: kho venāgapuriko vacchagotto brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: kho venāgapurikaḥ vaccha gottaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “Acchariyaṁ, bho gotama, abbhutaṁ, bho gotama.
analyzed: acchariya bho gotama abbhuta bho gotama

original: Yāvañcidaṁ bhoto gotamassa vippasannāni indriyāni, parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto.
analyzed: yāvañcidam bhoto gotamassa vippasannāni indriyāni parisuddhaḥ chavi vaṇṇaḥ pariyodāto

original: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, sāradaṁ badarapaṇḍuṁ parisuddhaṁ hoti pariyodātaṁ;
analyzed: seyyathā api bho gotama sāradam badara paṇḍum parisuddham hoti

original: evamevaṁ bhoto gotamassa vippasannāni indriyāni parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto.
analyzed: evam evam bhoto gotamassa vippasannāni indriyāni parisuddhaḥ chavi vaṇṇaḥ pariyodāto

original: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, tālapakkaṁ sampati bandhanā pamuttaṁ parisuddhaṁ hoti pariyodātaṁ;
analyzed: seyyathā api bho gotama tāla pakkam sampati bandhanā pamuttam parisuddham hoti

original: evamevaṁ bhoto gotamassa vippasannāni indriyāni parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto.
analyzed: evam evam bhoto gotamassa vippasannāni indriyāni parisuddhaḥ chavi vaṇṇaḥ pariyodāto

original: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nekkhaṁ jambonadaṁ dakkhakammāraputtasuparikammakataṁ ukkāmukhe sukusalasampahaṭṭhaṁ paṇḍukambale nikkhittaṁ bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca;
analyzed: seyyathā api bho gotama nekkham jambonadam dakkha kammāra putta su parikamma katam ukkā mukhe su kusala sampahaṭṭham paṇḍu kambale nikkhittam bhāsate ca tapate ca virocati ca

original: evamevaṁ bhoto gotamassa vippasannāni indriyāni parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto.
analyzed: evam evam bhoto gotamassa vippasannāni indriyāni parisuddhaḥ chavi vaṇṇaḥ pariyodāto

original: Yāni tāni, bho gotama, uccāsayanamahāsayanāni, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: yāni tāni bho gotama uccāsayana mahāsayanāni

original: āsandi pallaṅko gonako cittako paṭikā paṭalikā tūlikā vikatikā uddalomī ekantalomī
analyzed: āsandi pallaṅkaḥ gonako cittako paṭikā paṭalikā tūlikā vikatikā uddalomī ekantalomī

original: kaṭṭissaṁ koseyyaṁ kuttakaṁ hatthattharaṁ assattharaṁ rathattharaṁ ajinappaveṇī kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇaṁ
analyzed: kaṭṭissam koseyyam kuttakam hatthattharam assattharam rathattharam ajinappaveṇī kadali miga pavara paccattharaṇa

original: sauttaracchadaṁ ubhatolohitakūpadhānaṁ, evarūpānaṁ nūna bhavaṁ gotamo uccāsayanamahāsayanānaṁ
analyzed: sa auttaracchadam ubhatas lohitakūpa dhāne nūna bhavam gotamaḥ

original: nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti.
analyzed: nikāma lābhī a kiccha lābhī a kasira lābhī iti

original: “Yāni kho pana tāni, brāhmaṇa, uccāsayanamahāsayanāni, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: yāni khalu pana tāni brāhmaṇaḥ uccāsayana mahāsayanāni

original: āsandi pallaṅko gonako cittako paṭikā paṭalikā tūlikā vikatikā uddalomī ekantalomī
analyzed: āsandi pallaṅkaḥ gonako cittako paṭikā paṭalikā tūlikā vikatikā uddalomī ekantalomī

original: kaṭṭissaṁ koseyyaṁ kuttakaṁ hatthattharaṁ assattharaṁ rathattharaṁ ajinappaveṇī kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇaṁ
analyzed: kaṭṭissam koseyyam kuttakam hatthattharam assattharam rathattharam ajinappaveṇī kadali miga pavara paccattharaṇa

original: sauttaracchadaṁ ubhatolohitakūpadhānaṁ.
analyzed: sa auttaracchadam ubhatas lohita kūpa dhāna

original: Dullabhāni tāni pabbajitānaṁ laddhā ca pana na kappanti.
analyzed: dullabhāni tāni pabbajitānam laddhā ca pana na kappanti

original: Tīṇi kho, imāni, brāhmaṇa, uccāsayanamahāsayanāni, yesāhaṁ etarahi nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
analyzed: tīṇi kho imāni brāhmaṇaḥ uccāsayana mahāsayanāni yesāham etarahi nikāma lābhī a kiccha lābhī a kasira lābhī

original: Katamāni tīṇi?
analyzed: katamāni tīṇi

original: Dibbaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ, brahmaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ, ariyaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ.
analyzed: dibbam uccāsayana mahāsayana brahmam uccāsayana mahāsayana ariyam uccāsayana mahāsayana

original: Imāni kho, brāhmaṇa, tīṇi uccāsayanamahāsayanāni, yesāhaṁ etarahi nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti.
analyzed: imāni khalu brāhmaṇa tīṇi uccāsayana mahāsayanāni yesāham etarahi nikāma lābhī a kiccha lābhī a kasira lābhī iti

original: “Katamaṁ pana taṁ, bho gotama, dibbaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ, yassa bhavaṁ gotamo etarahi nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti?
analyzed: katamam pana bho gotama dibbam uccāsayana mahāsayana yassa bhavam gotamaḥ etarahi nikāma lābhī a kiccha lābhī a kasira lābhī iti

original: “Idhāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, yaṁ gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā upanissāya viharāmi, so pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tameva gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisāmi.
analyzed: idha āha brāhmaṇa yam gāmam vā nigamam vā upanissāya viharāmi so pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya tam eva gāmam vā nigamam vā piṇḍāya pavisāmi

original: So pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vanantaññeva pavisāmi.
analyzed: so pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantaḥ vanantaññā iva pavisāmi

original: So yadeva tattha honti tiṇāni vā paṇṇāni vā tāni ekajjhaṁ saṅgharitvā nisīdāmi pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
analyzed: saḥ yat eva tattha honti tiṇāni vā paṇṇāni vā tāni ekajjham saṅgharitvā nisīdāmi pallaṅkam ābhujitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya parimukham satim upaṭṭhapetvā

original: So vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi;
analyzed: saḥ vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi sa vitakkam sa vicāram viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharāmi

original: vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi;
analyzed: vitakka vicārānam vūpasamāḥ ajjhattam sampasādanam cetasaḥ eka udi bhāvam a vitakkam a vicāram samādhi jam pīti sukham dutiyam jhānam upasampajja viharāmi

original: pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharāmi sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedemi,
analyzed: pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharāmi sataḥ ca sampajāno sukham ca kāyena paṭisavedemi

original: yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi;
analyzed: yam tam ariyāḥ ācikkhanti upekkhakaḥ satimā sukha vihārī iti tatiyam jhānam upasampajja viharāmi

original: sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi.
analyzed: sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbā iva somanassa domanassānam atthaṅgamā adukkham asukham upekkhā sati pārisuddhim catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharāmi

original: So ce ahaṁ, brāhmaṇa, evaṁbhūto caṅkamāmi, dibbo me eso tasmiṁ samaye caṅkamo hoti.
analyzed: saḥ ce aha brāhmaṇaḥ eva bhūtaḥ caṅkamāmi dibbaḥ me eso tasmin samaye caṅkamaḥ hoti

original: So ce ahaṁ, brāhmaṇa, evaṁbhūto tiṭṭhāmi, dibbaṁ me etaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ṭhānaṁ hoti.
analyzed: saḥ ce aha brāhmaṇaḥ eva bhūto tiṭṭhāmi dibbam me etam tasmim samaye ṭhānam hoti

original: So ce ahaṁ, brāhmaṇa, evaṁbhūto nisīdāmi, dibbaṁ me etaṁ tasmiṁ samaye āsanaṁ hoti.
analyzed: saḥ ce aha brāhmaṇaḥ eva bhūtaḥ nisīdāmi dibbam me etam tasmin samaye āsanam hoti

original: So ce ahaṁ, brāhmaṇa, evaṁbhūto seyyaṁ kappemi, dibbaṁ me etaṁ tasmiṁ samaye uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ hoti.
analyzed: saḥ ce aha brāhmaṇaḥ evabhūtaḥ seyyam kappemi dibbam me etam tasmim samaye uccāsayana mahāsayanam hoti

original: Idaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, dibbaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ, yassāhaṁ etarahi nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti.
analyzed: idam kho brāhmaṇa dibbam uccāsayana mahāsayana yassa aham etarahi nikāma lābhī a kiccha lābhī a kasira lābhī iti

original: “Acchariyaṁ, bho gotama, abbhutaṁ, bho gotama.
analyzed: acchariya bho gotama abbhuta bho gotama

original: Ko cañño evarūpassa dibbassa uccāsayanamahāsayanassa nikāmalābhī bhavissati akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, aññatra bhotā gotamena.
analyzed: kaḥ caññaḥ evarūpassa dibbassa uccāsayana mahāsayanassa nikāma lābhī bhavissati akiccha lābhī akasira lābhī aññatra bhotā gotamena

original: Katamaṁ pana taṁ, bho gotama, brahmaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ, yassa bhavaṁ gotamo etarahi nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti?

original: Katamaṁ pana taṁ, bho gotama, ariyaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ, yassa bhavaṁ gotamo etarahi nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti?
analyzed: katamam pana bho gotama ariyam uccāsayana mahāsayana yassa bhavam gotamaḥ etarahi nikāma lābhī a kiccha lābhī a kasira lābhī iti

original: “Idhāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, yaṁ gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā upanissāya viharāmi, so pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tameva gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisāmi.
analyzed: idha āha brāhmaṇa yam gāmam vā nigamam vā upanissāya viharāmi so pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya tam eva gāmam vā nigamam vā piṇḍāya pavisāmi

original: So pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vanantaññeva pavisāmi.
analyzed: so pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantaḥ vanantaññā iva pavisāmi

original: So yadeva tattha honti tiṇāni vā paṇṇāni vā tāni ekajjhaṁ saṅgharitvā nisīdāmi pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
analyzed: saḥ yat eva tattha honti tiṇāni vā paṇṇāni vā tāni ekajjham saṅgharitvā nisīdāmi pallaṅkam ābhujitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya parimukham satim upaṭṭhapetvā

original: So evaṁ jānāmi:
analyzed: saḥ u evam jānāmi

original: ‘rāgo me pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṁ anuppādadhammo;
analyzed: rāgaḥ me pahīnaḥ ucchinna mūlaḥ tālā vatthu kataḥ anabhāvaṅkataḥ āyatim an uppāda dhammo

original: doso me pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṁ anuppādadhammo;
analyzed: dosaḥ me pahīnaḥ ucchinna mūlo tālā vatthu kataḥ anabhāvaṅkataḥ āyatim an uppāda dhammo

original: moho me pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṁ anuppādadhammo’.
analyzed: mohaḥ me pahīnaḥ ucchinna mūlo tālā vatthu kataḥ anabhāvaṅkataḥ āyatim an uppāda dhammo

original: So ce ahaṁ, brāhmaṇa, evaṁbhūto caṅkamāmi, ariyo me eso tasmiṁ samaye caṅkamo hoti.
analyzed: saḥ ce aha brāhmaṇaḥ eva bhūtaḥ caṅkamāmi ariyaḥ me esaḥ tasmin samaye caṅkamaḥ hoti

original: So ce ahaṁ, brāhmaṇa, evaṁbhūto tiṭṭhāmi …pe…
analyzed: saḥ ce aha brāhmaṇaḥ eva bhūto tiṭṭhāmi pe

original: nisīdāmi …pe…
analyzed: nisīdāmi pe

original: seyyaṁ kappemi, ariyaṁ me etaṁ tasmiṁ samaye uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ hoti.
analyzed: seyyam kappemi ariyam me etam tasmin samaye uccāsayana mahāsayanam hoti

original: Idaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, ariyaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ, yassāhaṁ etarahi nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti.
analyzed: idam kho brāhmaṇa ariyam uccāsayana mahāsayana yassa aham etarahi nikāma lābhī a kiccha lābhī a kasira lābhī iti

original: “Acchariyaṁ, bho gotama, abbhutaṁ, bho gotama.
analyzed: acchariya bho gotama abbhuta bho gotama

original: Ko cañño evarūpassa ariyassa uccāsayanamahāsayanassa nikāmalābhī bhavissati akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, aññatra bhotā gotamena.
analyzed: kaḥ caññaḥ evarūpassa ariyassa uccāsayana mahāsayanassa nikāma lābhī bhavissati akiccha lābhī akasira lābhī aññatra bhotā gotamena

original: Abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama.
analyzed: abhikkanta bho gotama abhikkanta bho gotama

original: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa
analyzed: seyyathā api bho gotama nikkujjitam vā ukkujjeyya paṭicchannam vā vivareyya mūḷhassa

original: vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya: ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti;
analyzed: vā maggam ācikkheyya andhakāre vā tela pajjotam dhāreyya cakkhumantaḥ rūpāni dakkhanti iti

original: evamevaṁ kho bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
analyzed: evam evam kho bhotā gotamena aneka pariyāyena dhammo pakāsito

original: Ete mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāma dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
analyzed: ete mayam bhavantam gotamam saraṇam gacchāma dhammañca bhikkhu saṅghañca

original: Upāsake no bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupete saraṇaṁ gate”ti.
analyzed: upāsake naḥ bhavam gotamaḥ dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupete saraṇam gatā iti

original: Tatiyaṁ.
analyzed: tatiya

original: Aṅguttara Nikāya 3.64
analyzed: aṅguttara nikāya

original: 7. Mahāvagga
analyzed: mahāvagga

original: Sarabhasutta
analyzed: sarabhasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate

original: Tena kho pana samayena sarabho nāma paribbājako acirapakkanto hoti imasmā dhammavinayā.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sarabhaḥ nāma paribbājakaḥ acira pakkantaḥ hoti imasmai dhamma vinayā

original: So rājagahe parisati evaṁ vācaṁ bhāsati:
analyzed: saḥ rājagahe parisati evam vācam bhāsati

original: “aññāto mayā samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtikānaṁ dhammo.
analyzed: aññātaḥ mayā samaṇānam sakya puttikānam dhammo

original: Aññāya ca panāhaṁ samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtikānaṁ dhammaṁ evāhaṁ tasmā dhammavinayā apakkanto”ti.
analyzed: aññāya ca pana aham samaṇānam sakya puttikānam dhammam eva aham tasmā dhamma vinayā apakkanto ti

original: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṁ piṇḍāya pavisiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho sambahulāḥ bhikkhū pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya rājagaham piṇḍāya pavisisu

original: Assosuṁ kho te bhikkhū sarabhassa paribbājakassa rājagahe parisati evaṁ vācaṁ bhāsamānassa:
analyzed: assosum kho te bhikkhū sarabhassa paribbājakassa rājagahe parisati evam vācam bhāsamānassa

original: “aññāto mayā samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtikānaṁ dhammo.
analyzed: aññātaḥ mayā samaṇānam sakya puttikānam dhammo

original: Aññāya ca panāhaṁ samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtikānaṁ dhammaṁ evāhaṁ tasmā dhammavinayā apakkanto”ti.
analyzed: aññāya ca pana aham samaṇānam sakya puttikānam dhammam eva aham tasmā dhamma vinayā apakkanto ti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā yena
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantāḥ yena

original: bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
analyzed: bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnāḥ kho te bhikkhū bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “sarabho nāma, bhante, paribbājako acirapakkanto imasmā dhammavinayā.
analyzed: sarabhaḥ nāma bhante paribbājakaḥ acira pakkantaḥ imasmai dhamma vinayā

original: So rājagahe parisati evaṁ vācaṁ bhāsati:
analyzed: saḥ rājagahe parisati evam vācam bhāsati

original: ‘aññāto mayā samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtikānaṁ dhammo.
analyzed: aññātaḥ mayā samaṇānam sakya puttikānam dhammo

original: Aññāya ca panāhaṁ samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtikānaṁ dhammaṁ evāhaṁ tasmā dhammavinayā apakkanto’ti.
analyzed: aññāya ca pana aham samaṇānam sakya puttikānam dhammam eva aham tasmā dhamma vinayā apakkanto ti

original: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā yena sippinikātīraṁ paribbājakārāmo yena sarabho paribbājako tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante bhagavā yena sippinikā tīram paribbājaka ārāmaḥ yena sarabhaḥ paribbājako tena upasaṅkamatu anukampam upādāya ati

original: Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena.
analyzed: adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena

original: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena sippinikātīraṁ paribbājakārāmo
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ yena sippinikā tīram paribbājaka ārāmaḥ

original: yena sarabho paribbājako tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi. Nisajja
analyzed: yena sarabhaḥ paribbājako tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi nisajja

original: kho bhagavā sarabhaṁ paribbājakaṁ etadavoca:

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, sarabha, evaṁ vadesi:
analyzed: saccam kira tva sarabhaḥ evam vadesi

original: ‘aññāto mayā samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtikānaṁ dhammo.
analyzed: aññātaḥ mayā samaṇānam sakya puttikānam dhammo

original: Aññāya ca panāhaṁ samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtikānaṁ dhammaṁ evāhaṁ tasmā dhammavinayā apakkanto’”ti?
analyzed: aññāya ca pana aham samaṇānam sakya puttikānam dhammam eva aham tasmā dhamma vinayā apakkanto ti

original: Evaṁ vutte, sarabho paribbājako tuṇhī ahosi.
analyzed: evam vutte sarabhaḥ paribbājako tuṇhī ahosi

original: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā sarabhaṁ paribbājakaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho bhagavā sarabham paribbājakam etat avoca

original: “vadehi, sarabha, kinti te aññāto samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtikānaṁ dhammo?
analyzed: vadehi sarabha kinti te aññātaḥ samaṇānam sakya puttikānam dhammo

original: Sace te aparipūraṁ bhavissati, ahaṁ paripūressāmi.
analyzed: sace te a paripūram bhavissati aham paripūressāmi

original: Sace pana te paripūraṁ bhavissati, ahaṁ anumodissāmī”ti.
analyzed: sace pana te paripūram bhavissati aham anumodissāmi iti

original: Dutiyampi kho sarabho paribbājako tuṇhī ahosi.
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho sarabhaḥ paribbājako tuṇhī ahosi

original: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā sarabhaṁ paribbājakaṁ etadavoca:

original: “yo kho, sarabha, paññāyati samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtikānaṁ dhammo vadehi, sarabha, kinti te aññāto samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtikānaṁ dhammo?
analyzed: yaḥ kho sarabha paññāyati samaṇānam sakya puttikānam dhammaḥ vadehi sarabha kinti te aññātaḥ samaṇānam sakya puttikānam dhammo

original: Sace te aparipūraṁ bhavissati, ahaṁ paripūressāmi.
analyzed: sace te a paripūram bhavissati aham paripūressāmi

original: Sace pana te paripūraṁ bhavissati, ahaṁ anumodissāmī”ti.
analyzed: sace pana te paripūram bhavissati aham anumodissāmi iti

original: Tatiyampi kho sarabho paribbājako tuṇhī ahosi.
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho sarabhaḥ paribbājako tuṇhī ahosi

original: Atha kho te paribbājakā sarabhaṁ paribbājakaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho te paribbājakā sarabham paribbājakam etat avocu

original: “yadeva kho tvaṁ, āvuso sarabha, samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ yāceyyāsi tadeva te samaṇo gotamo pavāreti.
analyzed: yat eva khalu tvam āvuso sarabha samaṇam gotamam yāceyyāsi tat eva te samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ pavāra iti

original: Vadehāvuso sarabha, kinti te aññāto samaṇānaṁ sakyaputtikānaṁ dhammo?
analyzed: vadeha āvuso sarabha kinti te aññātaḥ samaṇānam sakya puttikānam dhammo

original: Sace te aparipūraṁ bhavissati, samaṇo gotamo paripūressati.
analyzed: sace te a paripūram bhavissati samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ paripūressati

original: Sace pana te paripūraṁ bhavissati, samaṇo gotamo anumodissatī”ti.
analyzed: sace pana te paripūram bhavissati samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ anumodissati iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, sarabho paribbājako tuṇhībhūto maṅkubhūto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhāyanto appaṭibhāno nisīdi.
analyzed: evam vutte sarabhaḥ paribbājakaḥ tuṇhībhūtaḥ maṅku bhūtaḥ patta kkhandhaḥ adhomukhaḥ pajjhāyantaḥ appaṭibhānaḥ nisīdi

original: Atha kho bhagavā sarabhaṁ paribbājakaṁ tuṇhībhūtaṁ maṅkubhūtaṁ pattakkhandhaṁ adhomukhaṁ pajjhāyantaṁ appaṭibhānaṁ viditvā te paribbājake etadavoca:

original: “Yo kho maṁ, paribbājakā, evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: yaḥ kho ma paribbājakāḥ evam vadeyya

original: ‘sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā’ti, tamahaṁ tattha sādhukaṁ samanuyuñjeyyaṁ samanugāheyyaṁ samanubhāseyyaṁ.
analyzed: sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānataḥ ime dhammāḥ an abhisambuddhāḥ ati tam aham tattha sādhukam samanuyuñjeyyam samanugāheyyam samanubhāseyya

original: So vata mayā sādhukaṁ samanuyuñjiyamāno samanugāhiyamāno samanubhāsiyamāno aṭṭhānametaṁ

analyzed: bahiddhā katham apanāmessati kopam ca dosam ca appaccayam ca pātukarissati tuṇhībhūtaḥ

analyzed: maṅku bhūtaḥ pattakkhandhaḥ adhomukhaḥ pajjhāyantaḥ appaṭibhānaḥ nisīdissati seyyathā api

analyzed: sarabhaḥ paribbājako

analyzed: khīṇa asavassa te paṭijānataḥ ime āsavāḥ a parikkhīṇā ti tam aham tattha sādhukam samanuyuñjeyyam samanugāheyyam samanubhāseyya

original: So vata mayā sādhukaṁ samanuyuñjiyamāno samanugāhiyamāno samanubhāsiyamāno aṭṭhānametaṁ

analyzed: bahiddhā katham apanāmessati kopam ca dosam ca appaccayam ca pātukarissati tuṇhībhūtaḥ

original: bahiddhā kathaṁ apanāmessati, kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukarissati, tuṇhībhūto
analyzed: bahiddhā katham apanāmessati kopam ca dosam ca appaccayam ca pātukarissati tuṇhībhūtaḥ

original: maṅkubhūto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhāyanto appaṭibhāno nisīdissati, seyyathāpi

original: sarabho paribbājako”ti.
analyzed: sarabho paribbājako ti

original: Atha kho bhagavā sippinikātīre paribbājakārāme tikkhattuṁ sīhanādaṁ naditvā vehāsaṁ pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā sippinikā tīre paribbājaka ārāme tikkhattum sīha nādam naditvā vehāsam pakkāmi

original: Atha kho te paribbājakā acirapakkantassa bhagavato sarabhaṁ paribbājakaṁ samantato vācāyasannitodakena sañjambharimakaṁsu:

original: “seyyathāpi, āvuso sarabha, brahāraññe jarasiṅgālo ‘sīhanādaṁ nadissāmī’ti siṅgālakaṁyeva nadati, bheraṇḍakaṁyeva nadati;

original: evamevaṁ kho tvaṁ, āvuso sarabha, aññatreva samaṇena gotamena ‘sīhanādaṁ nadissāmī’ti siṅgālakaṁyeva nadasi bheraṇḍakaṁyeva nadasi.

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho channo paribbājako āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho channaḥ paribbājakaḥ āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “tumhepi, āvuso ānanda, rāgassa pahānaṁ paññāpetha, dosassa pahānaṁ paññāpetha, mohassa pahānaṁ paññāpethā”ti.
analyzed: tumhe pi āvuso ānanda rāgassa pahānam paññāpetha dosassa pahānam paññāpetha mohassa pahānam paññāpetha ati

original: “Mayaṁ kho, āvuso, rāgassa pahānaṁ paññāpema, dosassa pahānaṁ paññāpema, mohassa pahānaṁ paññapemā”ti.

original: “Kiṁ pana tumhe, āvuso, rāge ādīnavaṁ disvā rāgassa pahānaṁ paññāpetha, kiṁ dose ādīnavaṁ disvā dosassa pahānaṁ paññāpetha, kiṁ mohe ādīnavaṁ disvā mohassa pahānaṁ paññāpethā”ti?
analyzed: kim pana tumhe āvuso rāge ādīnavam disvā rāgassa pahānam paññāpetha kim dose ādīnavam disvā dosassa pahānam paññāpetha kim mohe ādīnavam disvā mohassa pahānam paññāpetha ati

original: “Ratto kho, āvuso, rāgena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto attabyābādhāyapi ceteti, parabyābādhāyapi ceteti, ubhayabyābādhāyapi ceteti, cetasikampi dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti;
analyzed: rattaḥ kho āvuso rāgena abhibhūtaḥ pariyādinna cittaḥ atta byābādhāya api cetā iti para byābādhāya api cetā iti ubhaya byābādhāya api cetā iti cetasikam pi dukkham domanassam paṭisavedeti

original: rāge pahīne nevattabyābādhāyapi ceteti, na parabyābādhāyapi ceteti, na ubhayabyābādhāyapi ceteti, na cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
analyzed: rāge pahīne na ivatta byābādhāya api ceteti na para byābādhāya api ceteti na ubhaya byābādhāya api ceteti na cetasikam dukkham domanassam paṭisavedeti

original: Ratto kho, āvuso, rāgena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto kāyena duccaritaṁ carati, vācāya duccaritaṁ carati, manasā duccaritaṁ carati;
analyzed: rattaḥ kho āvuso rāgena abhibhūtaḥ pariyādinna cittaḥ kāyena duccaritam carati vācāya duccaritam carati manasā duccaritam carati

original: rāge pahīne neva kāyena duccaritaṁ carati, na vācāya duccaritaṁ carati, na manasā duccaritaṁ carati.
analyzed: rāge pahīne na iva kāyena duccaritam carati na vācāya duccaritam carati na manasā duccaritam carati

original: Ratto kho, āvuso, rāgena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto attatthampi yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti, paratthampi yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti, ubhayatthampi yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti;
analyzed: rattaḥ kho āvuso rāgena abhibhūtaḥ pariyādinna cittaḥ atta attham pi yathābhūtam na pajānāti parattham pi yathābhūtam na pajānāti ubhayattham pi yathābhūtam na pajānāti

original: rāge pahīne attatthampi yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, paratthampi yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, ubhayatthampi yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.

original: Rāgo kho, āvuso, andhakaraṇo acakkhukaraṇo aññāṇakaraṇo paññānirodhiko vighātapakkhiko anibbānasaṁvattaniko.

original: Duṭṭho kho, āvuso, dosena …pe…

original: mūḷho kho, āvuso, mohena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto attabyābādhāyapi ceteti, parabyābādhāyapi ceteti, ubhayabyābādhāyapi ceteti, cetasikampi dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti;

original: mohe pahīne nevattabyābādhāyapi ceteti, na parabyābādhāyapi ceteti, na ubhayabyābādhāyapi ceteti, na cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
analyzed: mohe pahīne na ivatta byābādhāya api ceteti na para byābādhāya api ceteti na ubhaya byābādhāya api ceteti na cetasikam dukkham domanassam paṭisavedeti

original: Mūḷho kho, āvuso, mohena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto kāyena duccaritaṁ carati, vācāya duccaritaṁ carati, manasā duccaritaṁ carati;

original: mohe pahīne neva kāyena duccaritaṁ carati, na vācāya duccaritaṁ carati, na manasā duccaritaṁ carati.
