original: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinno
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam ānandam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinnaḥ

original: kho abhayo licchavi āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: kho abhayaḥ licchavi āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “nigaṇṭho, bhante, nāṭaputto sabbaññū sabbadassāvī aparisesaṁ ñāṇadassanaṁ paṭijānāti:
analyzed: nigaṇṭhaḥ bhante nāṭa putto sabbaññū sabba dassāvī aparisesam ñāṇa dassanam paṭijānāti

original: ‘carato ca me tiṭṭhato ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satataṁ samitaṁ ñāṇadassanaṁ paccupaṭṭhitan’ti.
analyzed: carataḥ ca me tiṭṭhataḥ ca suttassa ca jāgarassa ca satatam samitam ñāṇa dassanam paccupaṭṭhitanti

original: So purāṇānaṁ kammānaṁ tapasā byantībhāvaṁ paññāpeti navānaṁ kammānaṁ akaraṇā setughātaṁ.
analyzed: so purāṇānam kammānam tapasā byantībhāvam paññāpeti navānam kammānam a karaṇā setughāta

original: Iti kammakkhayā dukkhakkhayo, dukkhakkhayā vedanākkhayo, vedanākkhayā sabbaṁ dukkhaṁ nijjiṇṇaṁ bhavissati—
analyzed: iti kamma kkhayā dukkha kkhayaḥ dukkha kkhayā vedanā kkhayaḥ vedanā kkhayā sabbam dukkham nijjiṇṇam bhavissati

original: evametissā sandiṭṭhikāya nijjarāya visuddhiyā samatikkamo hoti.
analyzed: evam etissā sandiṭṭhikāya nijjarāya visuddhiyā samatikkamaḥ hoti

original: Idha, bhante, bhagavā kimāhā”ti?
analyzed: idha bhante bhagavā kim āha ati

original: “Tisso kho imā, abhaya, nijjarā visuddhiyo tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā
analyzed: tissaḥ kho imāḥ abhaya nijjarā visuddhiyaḥ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā

original: sammāsambuddhena sammadakkhātā sattānaṁ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṁ samatikkamāya
analyzed: sammāsambuddhena sammad akkhātā sattānam visuddhiyā soka paridevānam samatikkamāya

original: dukkhadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya.
analyzed: dukkha domanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya

original: Katamā tisso?
analyzed: katamāḥ tissaḥ

original: Idha, abhaya, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti …pe… samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
analyzed: idha abhaya bhikkhu sīlavā hoti pe samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu

original: So navañca kammaṁ na karoti, purāṇañca kammaṁ phussa phussa byantīkaroti.
analyzed: saḥ navam ca kammam na karoti purāṇam ca kammam phussa phussa byantīkaroti

original: Sandiṭṭhikā nijjarā akālikā ehipassikā opaneyyikā paccattaṁ veditabbā viññūhīti.
analyzed: sandiṭṭhikā nijjarā akālikā ehipassikā opaneyyikā paccattam veditabbā viññūhi iti

original: Sa kho so, abhaya, bhikkhu evaṁ sīlasampanno vivicceva kāmehi …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: sa kho so abhaya bhikkhu evam sīla sampannaḥ vivicca iva kāmehi pe catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: So navañca kammaṁ na karoti, purāṇañca kammaṁ phussa phussa byantīkaroti.
analyzed: saḥ navam ca kammam na karoti purāṇam ca kammam phussa phussa byantīkaroti

original: Sandiṭṭhikā nijjarā akālikā ehipassikā opaneyyikā paccattaṁ veditabbā viññūhīti.
analyzed: sandiṭṭhikā nijjarā akālikā ehipassikā opaneyyikā paccattam veditabbā viññūhi iti

original: Sa kho so, abhaya, bhikkhu evaṁ samādhisampanno āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: sa kho saḥ abhaya bhikkhu evam samādhi sampannaḥ āsavānam khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati

original: So navañca kammaṁ na karoti, purāṇañca kammaṁ phussa phussa byantīkaroti.
analyzed: saḥ navam ca kammam na karoti purāṇam ca kammam phussa phussa byantīkaroti

original: Sandiṭṭhikā nijjarā akālikā ehipassikā opaneyyikā paccattaṁ veditabbā viññūhīti.
analyzed: sandiṭṭhikā nijjarā akālikā ehipassikā opaneyyikā paccattam veditabbā viññūhi iti

original: Imā kho, abhaya, tisso nijjarā visuddhiyo tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena
analyzed: imāḥ kho abhaya tissaḥ nijjarāḥ visuddhiyaḥ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena

original: sammadakkhātā sattānaṁ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṁ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṁ
analyzed: sammad akkhātā sattānam visuddhiyā soka paridevānam samatikkamāya dukkha domanassānaṃ

original: atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyā”ti.
analyzed: atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, paṇḍitakumārako licchavi abhayaṁ licchaviṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte paṇḍita kumārakaḥ licchavi abhayam licchavim etat avoca

original: “kiṁ pana tvaṁ, samma abhaya, āyasmato ānandassa subhāsitaṁ subhāsitato nābbhanumodasī”ti?
analyzed: kim pana tva samma abhaya āyasmataḥ ānandassa subhāsitam subhāsitataḥ na abbhanumodasi iti

original: “Kyāhaṁ, samma paṇḍitakumāraka, āyasmato ānandassa subhāsitaṁ subhāsitato nābbhanumodissāmi.
analyzed: samma paṇḍita kumārakaḥ āyasmataḥ ānandassa su bhāsitam su bhāsitataḥ na abbhanumodissāmi

original: Muddhāpi tassa vipateyya yo āyasmato ānandassa subhāsitaṁ subhāsitato nābbhanumodeyyā”ti.
analyzed: muddhā api tassa vipateyya yaḥ āyasmataḥ ānandassa subhāsitam subhāsitataḥ na abbhanumodeyya ati

original: Catutthaṁ.
analyzed: catuttha

original: Aṅguttara Nikāya 3.75
analyzed: aṅguttara nikāya

original: 8. Ānandavagga
analyzed: ānanda vagga

original: Nivesakasutta
analyzed: nivesaka sutta

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmai ānandaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnam khalu āyasmantam ānandam bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Ye, ānanda, anukampeyyātha ye ca sotabbaṁ maññeyyuṁ mittā vā amaccā vā ñātī vā sālohitā vā te vo, ānanda, tīsu ṭhānesu samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā.
analyzed: ye ānanda anukampeyyātha ye ca sotabbam maññeyyum mittāḥ vā amaccāḥ vā ñātī vā sālohitāḥ vā te vaḥ ānanda tīsu ṭhānesu samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā

original: Katamesu tīsu?
analyzed: katamesu tīsu

original: Buddhe aveccappasāde samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā:
analyzed: buddhe avecca ppasāde samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā

original: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ, buddho bhagavā’ti,
analyzed: iti pi saḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ vijjā caraṇa sampanno sugataḥ loka vidū anuttaraḥ purisa damma sārathi satthā deva manussāna buddhaḥ bhagavā ati

original: dhamme aveccappasāde samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā:
analyzed: dhamme avecca ppasāde samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā

original: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī’ti,
analyzed: su ākkhātaḥ bhagavatā dhammaḥ sandiṭṭhikaḥ akālikaḥ ehipassikaḥ opaneyyikaḥ paccattam veditabbaḥ viññūhi iti

original: saṅghe aveccappasāde samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā:
analyzed: saṅghe avecca ppasāde samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā

original: ‘suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ujuppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ñāyappaṭipanno
analyzed: suppaṭipannaḥ bhagavataḥ sāvaka saṅghaḥ uju ppaṭipannaḥ bhagavataḥ sāvaka saṅghaḥ ñāya ppaṭipannaḥ

original: bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho sāmīcippaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, yadidaṁ cattāri purisayugāni
analyzed: bhagavato sāvaka saṅgho sāmīcippaṭipannaḥ bhagavato sāvaka saṅghaḥ yat idam cattāri purisa yugāni

original: aṭṭha purisapuggalā esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo
analyzed: aṭṭha purisa puggalā esa bhagavato sāvaka saṅgho āhuneyyaḥ pāhuneyyaḥ dakkhiṇeyyaḥ añjali karaṇīyo

original: anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā’ti.
analyzed: anuttaram puññakkhettam lokassa ati

original: Siyā, ānanda, catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ aññathattaṁ—
analyzed: siyā ānanda catunnam mahābhūtānam aññathatta

original: pathavīdhātuyā āpodhātuyā tejodhātuyā vāyodhātuyā, na tveva buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgatassa ariyasāvakassa siyā aññathattaṁ tatridaṁ aññathattaṁ.
analyzed: pathavī dhātuyā āpaḥ dhātuyā tejaḥ dhātuyā vāyo dhātuyā na tu eva buddhe avecca ppasādena samannāgatassa ariya sāvakassa siyā aññathattam tatridam aññathatta

original: So vatānanda, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato ariyasāvako nirayaṁ vā tiracchānayoniṁ vā pettivisayaṁ vā upapajjissatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saḥ vata ānanda buddhe avecca ppasādena samannāgataḥ ariya sāvakaḥ nirayam vā tiracchāna yonim vā pettivisayam vā upapajjissati iti na etam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Siyā, ānanda, catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ aññathattaṁ—
analyzed: siyā ānanda catunnam mahābhūtānam aññathatta

original: pathavīdhātuyā āpodhātuyā tejodhātuyā vāyodhātuyā, na tveva dhamme …pe…
analyzed: pathavī dhātuyā āpaḥ dhātuyā tejaḥ dhātuyā vāyo dhātuyā na tu eva dhamme pe

original: na tveva saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgatassa ariyasāvakassa siyā aññathattaṁ tatridaṁ aññathattaṁ.
analyzed: na tu eva saṅghe avecca ppasādena samannāgatassa ariya sāvakassa siyā aññathattam tatridam aññathatta

original: So vatānanda, saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgato ariyasāvako nirayaṁ vā tiracchānayoniṁ vā pettivisayaṁ vā upapajjissatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saḥ vata ānanda saṅghe avecca pasādena samannāgataḥ ariya sāvakaḥ nirayam vā tiracchāna yonim vā pettivisayam vā upapajjissati iti na etam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Ye, ānanda, anukampeyyātha ye ca sotabbaṁ maññeyyuṁ mittā vā amaccā vā ñātī vā sālohitā vā te vo, ānanda, imesu tīsu ṭhānesu samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā”ti.
analyzed: ye ānanda anukampeyyātha ye ca sotabbam maññeyyum mittāḥ vā amaccāḥ vā ñātī vā sālohitāḥ vā te vaḥ ānanda imesu tīsu ṭhānesu samādapetabbā nivesetabbā patiṭṭhāpetabbā ati

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti samādhismiṁ mattaso kārī paññāya mattaso kārī.

original: Na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbatā vuttā.

original: Yāni ca kho tāni sikkhāpadāni ādibrahmacariyakāni brahmacariyasāruppāni tattha dhuvasīlo ca hoti ṭhitasīlo ca, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
analyzed: yāni ca kho tāni sikkhāpadāni ādibrahmacariyakāni brahmacariya sāruppāni tattha dhuva sīlaḥ ca hoti ṭhita sīlaḥ ca samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu

analyzed: so tiṇṇam sayojanānam parikkhayā rāga dosa mohānam tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti sakideva imam lokam āgantvā dukkhassantam karoti

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti samādhismiṁ paripūrakārī paññāya mattaso kārī.

original: So yāni tāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni tāni āpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi.
analyzed: saḥ yāni tāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni tāni āpajjati pi vuṭṭhāti pi

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbatā vuttā.
analyzed: na hi mā ittha bhikkhave abhabba tā vuttā

original: Yāni ca kho tāni sikkhāpadāni ādibrahmacariyakāni brahmacariyasāruppāni tattha dhuvasīlo ca hoti ṭhitasīlo ca, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ yena saṅkavā nāma kosalānaṁ nigamo tadavasari.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā kosalesu cārikam caramānaḥ mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim yena saṅkavā nāma kosalānam nigamaḥ tat avasari

original: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā saṅkavāyaṁ viharati.
analyzed: tatra sudam bhagavā saṅkavāyam viharati

original: Tena kho pana samayena kassapagotto nāma bhikkhu saṅkavāyaṁ āvāsiko hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena kassapagottaḥ nāma bhikkhu saṅkavāyam āvāsikaḥ hoti

original: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā sikkhāpadapaṭisaṁyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya bhikkhū sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṁseti.

original: Atha kho kassapagottassa bhikkhuno bhagavati sikkhāpadapaṭisaṁyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya bhikkhū sandassente samādapente samuttejente sampahaṁsente ahudeva akkhanti ahu appaccayo:

original: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena rājagahaṁ tadavasari.
analyzed: anupubbena cārikam caramānaḥ yena rājagaham tat avasari

original: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati.
analyzed: tatra sudam bhagavā rājagahe viharati

original: Atha kho kassapagottassa bhikkhuno acirapakkantassa bhagavato ahudeva kukkuccaṁ ahu vippaṭisāro:

original: “alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṁ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṁ;

original: yassa me bhagavati sikkhāpadapaṭisaṁyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya bhikkhū sandassente samādapente samuttejente sampahaṁsente ahudeva akkhanti ahu appaccayo:
analyzed: yassa me bhagavati sikkhāpada paṭisayuttāya dhammiyā kathāya bhikkhū sandassente samādapente samuttejente sampahasente ahu deva akkhanti ahu appaccayo

original: ‘adhisallikhatevāyaṁ samaṇo’ti.
analyzed: adhisallikhatā iva ayam

original: Yannūnāhaṁ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkameyyaṁ; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato santike accayaṁ accayato deseyyan”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkameyya upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatoḥ santike accayam accayataḥ deseyyanti

original: Atha kho kassapagotto bhikkhu senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena rājagahaṁ tena pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho kassapa gottaḥ bhikkhu senāsanam sasāmetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena rājagaham tena pakkāmi

original: Anupubbena yena rājagahaṁ yena gijjhakūṭo pabbato yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā

original: ‘adhisallikhatevāyaṁ samaṇo’ti.
analyzed: adhisallikhatā iva ayam

original: ‘alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṁ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṁ;

original: yassa me bhagavati sikkhāpadapaṭisaṁyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya bhikkhū sandassente samādapente samuttejente sampahaṁsente ahudeva akkhanti ahu appaccayo:

original: “adhisallikhatevāyaṁ samaṇo”ti.
analyzed: adhisallikhatā iva ayam

original: “Navopi, bhikkhave, potthako dubbaṇṇo ca hoti dukkhasamphasso ca appaggho ca;
analyzed: navaḥ api bhikkhave potthakaḥ dubbaṇṇaḥ ca hoti dukkha samphassaḥ ca appagghaḥ ca

original: majjhimopi, bhikkhave, potthako dubbaṇṇo ca hoti dukkhasamphasso ca appaggho ca;
analyzed: majjhimaḥ api bhikkhave potthakaḥ dubbaṇṇaḥ ca hoti dukkha samphassaḥ ca appagghaḥ ca

original: jiṇṇopi, bhikkhave, potthako dubbaṇṇo ca hoti dukkhasamphasso ca appaggho ca.
analyzed: jiṇṇaḥ api bhikkhave potthakaḥ dubbaṇṇaḥ ca hoti dukkha samphassaḥ ca appagghaḥ ca

original: Jiṇṇampi, bhikkhave, potthakaṁ ukkhaliparimajjanaṁ vā karonti saṅkārakūṭe vā naṁ chaḍḍenti.
analyzed: jiṇṇam pi bhikkhave potthakam ukkhali parimajjanam vā karonti saṅkāra kūṭe vā nam chaḍḍenti

original: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, navo cepi bhikkhu hoti dussīlo pāpadhammo.
analyzed: evam evam kho bhikkhave navaḥ ce api bhikkhu hoti dussīlaḥ pāpa dhammo

original: Idamassa dubbaṇṇatāya vadāmi.
analyzed: idam assa dubbaṇṇa tāya vadāmi

original: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, potthako dubbaṇṇo tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ puggalaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: seyyathā api saḥ bhikkhave potthakaḥ dubbaṇṇaḥ tathūpamā āha bhikkhave imam puggalam vadāmi

original: Ye kho panassa sevanti bhajanti payirupāsanti diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjanti, tesaṁ taṁ hoti dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya.
analyzed: ye kho pana assa sevanti bhajanti payirupāsanti diṭṭha anugatim āpajjanti tesam tam hoti dīgharattam ahitāya dukkhāya

original: Idamassa dukkhasamphassatāya vadāmi.
analyzed: idam assa dukkha samphassa tāya vadāmi

original: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, potthako dukkhasamphasso tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ puggalaṁ vadāmi.
analyzed: seyyathā api saḥ bhikkhave potthakaḥ dukkha samphassaḥ tathūpamā āha bhikkhave imam puggalam vadāmi

original: Yesaṁ kho pana so paṭiggaṇhāti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ, tesaṁ taṁ na mahapphalaṁ hoti na mahānisaṁsaṁ.
analyzed: yesam kho pana saḥ paṭiggaṇhāti cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna ppaccaya bhesajja parikkhāra tesam tam na mahapphalam hoti na mahā nisasa

original: Idamassa appagghatāya vadāmi.
analyzed: idam assa appagghatāya vadāmi

original: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, potthako appaggho tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ puggalaṁ vadāmi.

original: Evarūpo cāyaṁ, bhikkhave, thero bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe bhaṇati.

analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave idha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanam samatikkamma anantam viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: So tadassādeti taṁ nikāmeti tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati, tatra ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṁ kurumāno viññāṇañcāyatanūpagānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: saḥ tat assādeti tam nikāmeti tena ca vittim āpajjati tatra ṭhitaḥ tad adhimuttaḥ tad bahula vihārī a parihīnaḥ kālam kurumānaḥ viññāṇam ca āyatana upagānam devānam sahabyatam upapajjati
